email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $52.50 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $51.25 per ton, which is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.25 is closer to our target. Can we settle at $51.00 per ton? Also, please confirm the laytime details. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $51.00 per ton. Laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 per ton works for us. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star for the crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. Please send over the charter party for review. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the charter party and send it over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah
